format: Corporate social deduction for Microsoft Teams (~60 minutes, 12–24 players). No good/evil framing; departments with KPIs.

win_conditions.compliance: Suspend all members of the Sales Department (Internal Audit complete).
win_conditions.customers: Reach the Refund Target (default 7 for 60-min format). +1 refund per suspension unless target was Upsold last night.
win_conditions.sales: All remaining Customers are Sold To (Upsold and survived the next day).

mechanics.upsell: Sales night action. Target a Customer. If suspended next day: refund BLOCKED (0). If survives: becomes Sold To (vote = 0).
mechanics.sold_to: Players remain alive and can speak; their suspension votes do not count.
mechanics.complaint: Customers file 1 complaint nightly. Target starts next day with +1 automatic vote unless protected by Sales Manager.
mechanics.sales_manager: Night action: select one Sales-aligned player. Complaint effects are nullified on them the next day (complaint still announced, no +1).
mechanics.refunds: +1 per suspension, except 0 if the suspended player was Upsold last night.
mechanics.voting: Complaint-driven ballot; simple majority (>50%) to suspend; no self-votes; Sold To votes do not count.

visibility.sold_to_public: Optional; can be secret with moderator-only tally.

sales: Sales Manager — nullify complaint effects on one Sales-aligned player nightly.
customers: Customer — team files one complaint per night (+1 vote next day).
compliance: Analyst — pair-alignment check: choose 2 players; learn the alignments present (e.g., '1 Sales + 1 Customer'), not which is which.
Officer — no night ability; disciplined voting.

night_order: Moderator: record and prep Day Report.
day_order: Ballot: complaint target + 1–2 nominees + No Suspension.
Vote (Teams poll 60–90s): simple majority; discount Sold To votes; invalidate self-votes.
Resolve suspension: remove player; refund +1 unless Upsold.
Win checks: refunds ≥ target (Customers) | all Sales suspended (Compliance) | all Customers Sold To (Sales).

design_notes.analyst_overlap: Analyst should overlap one player across nights to triangulate alignments.
design_notes.complaint_as_pressure: +1 auto-vote drives the ballot; Sales Manager nullify adds deception.
design_notes.balance_knob: Adjust Refund Target or Sales Manager variant to tune difficulty.
design_notes.visibility_knob: Choose to reveal or hide Upsold/Sold To for table complexity.
